task.title: Preparing for Your Upgrade
task.shortdesc: SiteCatalyst 15 (v15) offers significant changes to features and in the way Adobe collects, processes, and stores data. Because of these changes, our goal is to upgrade clients in an orderly manner that ensures your upgrade is a success. Your upgrade requires planning and time.

context.p: In preparation, Adobe recommends that you:

info.p: Identify new features that can reduce your workload and help answer data questions that you previously could not answer.

step.cmd: Understand the differences between SiteCatalyst 14 and SiteCatalyst 15

info.p: When you upgrade to version 15, your data is processed differently. You need to understand the improvements and changes in metric calculation. Understanding these differences helps you avoid unnecessary questions and confusion that your organization might see in the reporting results.
See Data Differences between SiteCatalyst 14 and 15.

step.cmd: Determine the amount of training that you and your organization need.

info.p: Before the upgrade, consider your SiteCatalyst user base and its level of expertise with analytics. If you have novice users, you might need to hold training sessions so that your users understand and can use the new features.

step.cmd: Notify your Account Manager about the best time for an upgrade.
Look for an e-mail from Adobe with instructions about selecting a final upgrade date.

info.note: All SiteCatalyst 15 upgrades occur on the first day of the calendar month, or the first day of a custom calendar month (depending on the calendar type you use in SiteCatalyst).
